name: Postal Knights
description:
In the kingdom of Acleria, a young youth begins a new job as a carrier for the Royal Postal Service. However, trouble is brewing in the land, leaving large portions of the land undefended, making their job much more difficult. It's up to you to make sure the mail is delivered on time!

You may not be the hero of the story, but you may be in the best spot to watch the story unfold...

Programming, Graphics, and Story by CurtisCreatesGames

Thanks to those who tested the demo. The game will be getting a major overhaul in structure, and new demo will be available in the future.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChaganCreates

Page Art by JennyPenny - Twitter: https://twitter.com/jennypennyart
